com.nagarro.Assignment1.validation

Class UserInputValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nagarro.Assignment1.validation.UserInputValidation

  • public class UserInputValidation
extends java.lang.Object
    Validate the input string of user by using regular Expressions. It also get the use input data and stores in a HashMapa as key value pairs.
    Author:
    ricktamkundu
